meaning.en: to descend (e.g. a mountain), to go down, to come down, to alight (e.g. from bus), to get off, to disembark, to dismount, to step down, to retire, to give up, to quit, to fold, to be granted, to be issued, to be given, to form (of frost, dew, mist, etc.), to be passed (from the body; e.g. of a roundworm)

hanVietExplain.vi: giáng: sa xuống, rớt xuống, hàng phục, đầu hàng
hanVietExplain.en: descend: to fall, to fall, to submit, to surrender

hanVietExplain.vi: há: đi xuống, ở bên dưới, đi xuống, ở bên dưới
hanVietExplain.en: huh: go down, below, go down, below

meaning.vi: xuống
meaning.en: down
